task.title: Adjust Segment Start and End Times
task.shortdesc: Adjust segment start and end times to refine segments.

step.stepresult: This action will replay the segment for the displayed record.

step.cmd: Select a portion of the waveform for your revised segment and press Enter. Alternately, typeover the existing time values in the Record Data view with revised values and click the Refresh button in the top left area of the Speech Analysis view.
step.stepresult: This action will adjust your segment start and end times.To view a larger portion of the waveform, click Show More. This extends the displayed interval by one second on each side. To redisplay the 500ms buffer, click Refresh.

step.cmd: If you would like to listen to or further revise the segments, repeat steps 1 and 2.
